titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an George Edward Moore, [7. 8. 1945]
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Original bei Timothy Moore; Kopie im BA. Publiziert (Letters, S. 182; deutsch: Briefe, S. 222; Cambridge Letters, S. 322; WiC, S. 381).

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: Thanks for your letter. I'm sorry I shan't hear the Bruckner now. Poor Tim! â€’ I think I understand your remark about the Schubert, & I feel something I could express in the same words. I believe it's something like this, that the Quintet has a phantastic kind of greatness. Is this what you'ld say? By the way, it was played by far better than I had expected.
